files.patch:
@@ -1010,6 +1010,4 @@
-     * values used by the underlying signature implementation if the underlying
-     * signature implementation supports returning the parameters as
-     * {@code AlgorithmParameters}. If the required
-     * parameters were not supplied and the underlying signature implementation
-     * can generate the parameter values, it will be returned. Otherwise,
-     * {@code null} is returned.
+     * values used by the underlying signature scheme. If the required
+     * parameters were not supplied and can be generated by the signature,
+     * the generated parameters will be returned. Otherwise, {@code null}
+     * is returned.

@@ -397,5 +397,4 @@
-     * values used by the underlying signature implementation if the underlying
-     * signature implementation supports returning the parameters as
-     * {@code AlgorithmParameters}. If the required parameters were not supplied
-     * and the underlying signature implementation can generate the parameter
-     * values, it will be returned. Otherwise, {@code null} is returned.
+     * values used by the underlying signature scheme. If the required
+     * parameters were not supplied and can be generated by the signature,
+     * the generated parameters will be returned. Otherwise, {@code null}
+     * is returned.
